name: @paykit-sdk/cli
description: PayKit CLI for product setup and development

scripts.build: npm run build:cli && npm run build:dev-app && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist/dev-app && cp -r dev-app/.next dist/dev-app/.next && cp dev-app/package.json dist/dev-app/ && echo '{"type": "module"}' > dist/package.json

author: PayKit Team
